<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get IPFIX Site Prefix Association (v2.0)</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/sdwan/v2.0/api/sites/{site_id}/ipfixlocalprefixes/{prefix_id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



List the IPFIX site prefix association.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"ID of the site.","in":"path","name":"site_id","required":true,"schema":{"description":"Site Id","type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"description":"ID of the prefix.","in":"path","name":"prefix_id","required":true,"schema":{"description":"Prefix Id","type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Successful Operation

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"id"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The ID of the IPFIX prefix.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"ipv4_prefixes"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The individual IP address.\n","items":{"description":"Ipv4 Prefixes","type":"string"},"type":"array"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"prefix_id"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The prefix ID that associates with a site.   \n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"tags"} required={false} schemaName={"string[]"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"A information field that can be added to identify the prefix. Maximum 10 unique tags of length 1024 each are allowed.      \n","items":{"description":"Tags","type":"string"},"type":"array"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"id\": \"string\",\n  \"ipv4_prefixes\": [\n    \"string\"\n  ],\n  \"prefix_id\": \"string\",\n  \"tags\": [\n    \"string\"\n  ]\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
